@title Corn Finance Simple Holding Strategy
 @author C.W.B.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CornFi Simple Strategy: Vault Only Function"

arguments.value: CornFi Simple Strategy: Vault Only Function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CornFi Simple Strategy: Vault Only Function"

documentation.text:
@dev Allows access to only currently active vaults and deactivated vaults. Vaults
 that have not been added to the controller contract are restricted.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CornFi Simple Strategy: Active Vault Only Function"

arguments.value: CornFi Simple Strategy: Active Vault Only Function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CornFi Simple Strategy: Active Vault Only Function"

documentation.text:
@dev Allows access to only currently active vaults. Vaults that have not been 
 added to the controller contract and deactivated vaults are restricted.

@param _amountIn: Amount of an ERC20 token
 @return The corresponding deposit fee amount

@param _amountIn: Amount of an ERC20 token
 @return The corresponding transaction fee amount

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
